briefTitle: Quality of Life, Employment, and Informal Care Costs in Women Who Are Receiving Chemotherapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Quality of Life, Employment and Informal Care Cost Analysis in Women Receiving Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Breast Cancer With 0-3 Positive Axillary Lymph Nodes
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Degree that symptoms interfere with patient functioning according to the National Cancer Institute (NCI) Common Toxicity Criteria
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient must be registered to CALGB 40101
* Patient must be able to communicate in English
